com.clover.sdk.util

Enum Platform.Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Platform.Feature>
      • com.clover.sdk.util.Platform.Feature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Platform.Feature>
    Enclosing class:
    Platform

    public static enum Platform.Feature
extends java.lang.Enum<Platform.Feature>
    List of features that may be present on Clover devices. Non-Clover devices will return false for all features.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BATTERY
      Device has battery.
      CUSTOMER_FACING_EXTERNAL_DISPLAY
      Device supports customer facing external display.
      CUSTOMER_MODE
      Device supports the CustomerMode class for checking, enabling and disabling customer mode.
      CUSTOMER_ROTATION
      Device supports merchant to customer rotation with landscape->portrait configuration change
      DEFAULT_EMPLOYEE
      Device supports login by a "default employee" without a PIN.
      ETHERNET
      Device has an ethernet port or supports an ethernet port attachment (may or may not be currently attached or connected).
      MOBILE_DATA
      Device includes cellular mobile data hardware.
      SECURE_PAYMENTS
      Device supports the Clover Secure Payments application for taking EMV ICC and NFC payments.
      SECURE_TOUCH
      Device has a secure touch screen.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • SECURE_PAYMENTS

        public static final Platform.Feature SECURE_PAYMENTS
        Device supports the Clover Secure Payments application for taking EMV ICC and NFC payments.

      • CUSTOMER_MODE

        public static final Platform.Feature CUSTOMER_MODE
        Device supports the CustomerMode class for checking, enabling and disabling customer mode.

      • MOBILE_DATA

        public static final Platform.Feature MOBILE_DATA
        Device includes cellular mobile data hardware.

      • DEFAULT_EMPLOYEE

        public static final Platform.Feature DEFAULT_EMPLOYEE
        Device supports login by a "default employee" without a PIN. May or may not actually be enabled, see MerchantProperties to check.

      • BATTERY

        public static final Platform.Feature BATTERY
        Device has battery.

      • ETHERNET

        public static final Platform.Feature ETHERNET
        Device has an ethernet port or supports an ethernet port attachment (may or may not be currently attached or connected).

      • SECURE_TOUCH

        public static final Platform.Feature SECURE_TOUCH
        Device has a secure touch screen.

      • CUSTOMER_FACING_EXTERNAL_DISPLAY

        public static final Platform.Feature CUSTOMER_FACING_EXTERNAL_DISPLAY
        Device supports customer facing external display.

      • CUSTOMER_ROTATION

        public static final Platform.Feature CUSTOMER_ROTATION
        Device supports merchant to customer rotation with landscape->portrait configuration change
